short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert a webpage from Hindi to Marwari language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The main objective of this extension to help end users to convert any Hindi website into Rajasthani Marwari language in following scripts/dialects: -

a) Marwari Bikaneri 
b) Marwari Jodhpuri

The extension offers following extended features to end users: -

1) Allows conversion of a web page into a selected language.

2) It also automatically converts other pages of the same website upon navigation or if the same is already opened in other tabs.

3) User can switch between Jodhpuri and Bikaneri language as desired or reset the conversion at any time to restore original Hindi website.
